main.name: Stephen Wanjohi
main.description: I know a thing or two about Computer Science
main.bio: Steve, is a Full Stack developer and experienced IT Support with over 7 years of experience. He has worked with IT startups and public agencies, helping build and scale their companies. Realizing his passion for teaching, Steve has worked on capacity-building different teams on several platforms. In this age of AI, he is confident on utilizing AI capabiltiies to scale organizations in various ways. Steve's goal is to equip mentees with the skills needed to succeed in practical IT. He provides hands-on experience and guidance within his community, helping aspiring developers gain practical knowledge. With an extensive background in Full Stack development.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the Stepworld Solutions

education.description: Graduated with 2nd Class Honours - Upper Division

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Fullstack Development, IT Support, Consultancy and Security.

testimonials.text: Steve is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Steve has been EPIC, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know it all!
